mil3.5.3:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.5.3:0.3_0: for the going forth of the Buddha, the propound of the awakening factor of investigation of principles.
mil3.5.3:1.2_0: “Are you able to know the supreme dragon?”
mil3.5.3:1.3_0: “Yes, great king. You know this, great king.”
mil3.5.3:1.4_0: “Sir, how is a Buddha awakened for themselves to the supreme guides?”
mil3.5.3:1.5_0: “Once upon a time, great king, there was a senior mendicant named Vāsabha. They were humiliated, and lost in the procedure of the senior mendicants.”
mil3.5.3:1.7_0: “In the same way, those who see the Buddha has taught the Dhamma sees the teaching.”
